remarks:
A subset relationship useful for converting union to indexed union using ~ dfiun2 or ~ dfiun2g and intersection to indexed intersection using ~ dfiin2 .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Sep-2015.) 

---

 A subset relationship useful for converting union to indexed union using dfiun2 or dfiun2g and intersection to indexed intersection using dfiin2 .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Sep-2015.)
statement:
uniiunlem $p |- ( A. x e. A B e. D -> ( A. x e. A B e. C <-> { y | E. x e. A y = B } C_ C ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d x y $.
